params.airgrabEnds: The timestamp when the airgrab ends
params.airgrabLockCliff: The cliff duration for the airgrabed tokens in weeks
params.airgrabLockSlope: The slope duration for the airgrabed tokens in weeks
params.airgrabRoot: The merkle root of the airgrab
params.celoCommunityFund_: The Celo community fund address where unclaimed tokens will be refunded to.
params.fractalMaxAge: The maximum age of the kyc for the airgrab
params.fractalSigner: The address of the fractal signer
params.token_: The token address in the airgrab.

returns._0: Airgrab The address of the new Airgrab contract
